p: There was no statistically significant difference in the patient characteristics including gender, age, height, weight, body mass index (BMI), ASA classification, anesthesia time, operation time, tidal volume, FEV 1/FVC, total lung volume, diabetes mellitus, hypertension, obstructive sleep apnea-hypopnea syndrome (OSAHS), and other general conditions between the two groups ( Table 1).
